alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued May 13 at 12:02PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... A FLASH FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA as flooding and showers have subsided around the territory. UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1200 TAEAO ASO FARAILE ME 13 2022 UA IAI NEI SE ...UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA LE LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA AUNUU MANUA A O FAAITIITIA TIMUGA MAMAFA MA TAFEGA I LE ITULA UA MAVAE. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
info.instruction: Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.
